title: Chrono Carbon Watch Face
summary: Superlative Chronometer, officially certified Android Wear.
description: Android Wear watch face Features: * Interactive Stopwatch Mode (tap bottom to start) * Many different accent Colors * Accurate battery level gauge at 6 o'clock * Digital 24 hr clock and Day/date display * optional full color ambient mode for LCD display* black and white ambient mode for OLED* all hands are ticking, not sweeping* very battery efficient* carbon mesh background
descriptionHTML:
Android Wear watch face Features:

* Interactive Stopwatch Mode (tap bottom to start)
* Many different accent Colors
* Accurate battery level gauge at 6 o'clock
* Digital 24 hr clock and Day/date display
* optional full color ambient mode for LCD display
* black and white ambient mode for OLED
* all hands are ticking, not sweeping
* very battery efficient
* carbon mesh background
